examples: How was your new teacher?
How will the rise in interest rates affect our bottom line?
How is the business doing?
How does that song go?
My, how time flies!
words.defineEn: in what manner or in what way
words.defineVi: theo cách nào hoặc theo cách nào

examples: What's the capital of Peru?’
What are your plans for today?
What's your favorite evening activity?
What is your favorite color?
What is the capital of France?
words.defineEn: used in questions to ask for information or for someone’s opinion
words.defineVi: được sử dụng trong các câu hỏi để hỏi thông tin hoặc ý kiến của ai đó

examples: When does the train go?
When does the concert begin?
When his head broke the surface he took in deep gulps of air.
So when will you deliver the cargo?
When he starts a job he goes at it hammer and tongs.
words.defineEn: used when we want to ask at what time something happens
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi chúng ta muốn hỏi vào thời gian nào một cái gì đó xảy ra

examples: Where do you keep the scissors?
Where did you get that skirt?
Where did you buy that dress?
Where do you live?
"Where have you been?"
words.defineEn: to or in what place, situation, or position
words.defineVi: đến hoặc ở nơi nào, tình huống hoặc vị trí

examples: Which team won?
Which door leads to the yard?
Which tie do you like best?
Which opera did Verdi write first?
Coach, which end of the field you want me to take if we lose the toss?
words.defineEn: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of things or people, when we are not sure about it or about them
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hỏi hoặc nói về một hoặc nhiều thành viên của một nhóm đồ vật hoặc con người, khi chúng ta không chắc chắn về điều đó hoặc về họ

examples: Who started the fire?
Who holds the world record for the long jump?
Says who?
Who needs a cassette player these days?
So who spilled the beans about her affair with David?
words.defineEn: used in questions to ask about the name or identity of one person or several people
words.defineVi: được sử dụng trong các câu hỏi để hỏi về tên hoặc danh tính của một người hoặc nhiều người

examples: Three cheers for Sarah, whose brilliant goal at the last minute won us the game!
The Beatles are a band that have become a household name and whose music is still popular decades later.
He is a self-interested liar, whose sole motive throughout his life has been looking after number one.
The scheme is designed to help kids whose parents have fallen on hard times.
Disposal of nuclear waste was a problem whose solution was endlessly delayed, a tar baby no one wanted anything to do with.
words.defineEn: used to show that the thing mentioned belongs to a particular person or thing
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ ra rằng điều được đề cập thuộc về một người hoặc vật cụ thể

examples: Why has the engine stopped?
Why did she kill her husband?
Why do you have detention?
Why not start now?
Why are women thinking twice about motherhood?
words.defineEn: used for asking the purpose of or reason for something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hỏi mục đích hoặc lý do cho một cái gì đó

examples: The incident says an awful lot about his character.
The clock says ten past two.
His angry glance said it all.
To say a prayer.
The clock said three o'clock.
words.defineEn: to use words and our voice to show what we are thinking or feeling
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ và giọng nói của chúng tôi để hiển thị những gì chúng tôi đang suy nghĩ hoặc cảm thấy

examples: The figures tell a different story.
To tell stories/jokes/lies.
She again told tales out of school.
Do tell me!
Tell me in words of one syllable!
words.defineEn: to use words and give someone information
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ và cung cấp cho ai đó thông tin
